name: Reshape Biotech
headline: Robots that automate the everyday tasks of microbiologists.
description:
Reshape Biotech builds lab robots that automate the everyday tasks of microbiologists, from filling plates to analyzing images.
Other companies try to sell “one lab robot that does everything”.  But those robots become so complicated that they sit unused on the shelf.  We build one robot for each function, which makes them easy to use.

founders.name: Carl-Emil Grøn Christensen, Founder
founders.description: Mechanical engineer, physicist and now CEO of Reshape Biotech

founders.name: Magnus Nyborg Madsen, Founder
founders.description: I'm extremely interested in robotics and automation, and in particular how they can accelerate R&D in the life sciences. I pursue these interests working at Reshape Biotech, which is a company founded with the goal of greatly improving the accessibility of laboratory automation solutions.

founders.name: Daniel Storgaard, Founder
founders.description: I work primarily with development and project management. I am testing our products, ensuring quality, talking to customers, and making sure customer requirements and feature requests are considered during product development. I am also responsible for financial planning and accounting.

# Experiment data you can trust, results you can act on
[Get started](http://reshapebiotech.com/<#>)
Why Reshape
Automate plate-based experiments, seamlessly capture data, and drive instant analysis with machine learning. All in one intelligent platform designed for scientists.
See how it works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/673c9d74d3cb36f4845ddb62_DTU%20Shoot-18%201.avif)
30M+
images captured
Our impact
## Powering the world’s best labs, from next-gen startups to industry giants
We combine automation with real-time AI analysis to help labs run faster, make better decisions, and scale effortlessly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674ed68a13132cd085e88fc5_dtu.svg)
3,300
**Hours monitored** 3 novel papers published
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674dff7422da6e1baab46350_quote.png)[Read case study"Getting deep insights into everything that happens during our experiment is hugely helpful to discover new phenomena more quickly.”![Morten Nørholm](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674f4799f86df854f2dc889b_morten_norholm.jpg)Morten NørholmPI & Research Group Leader DTU Biosustain, Genome Engineering Group & CSO CloneOpt](http://reshapebiotech.com/</case-studies/how-morten-norholm-is-pioneering-evolutionary-research-at-dtu-biosustain>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674a0f19300a4718adf52429_novonesis.svg)
15x
**Datapoints collected** leading to new insights
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/673f05c3beb90457ff985ec5_Stat.png)[Read case study“Reshape has given us a lot of new capabilities we didn’t have before, helping us tackle some of the trickiest experimental challenges in our work.”![Anja Kristiansen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674a2b76d69cc78b6a7c0932_a_kristiansen.jpg)Anja KristiansenSenior scientist Chr. Hansen, Combinatorial Microbiology](http://reshapebiotech.com/</case-studies/how-chr-hansen-is-accelerating>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/67470fd4278bdce5b98c2ee8_syngenta.svg)
400%
**Increase in throughput** with accurate AI analysis
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/673f04a41de4ceffc75b45df_Stat-1.png)[Read case study“With the help of Reshape, we have moved further in improving the workflow in 6 months than in the 3 years before with other solutions we tried.”![Stuart Harrison](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674a2b6451d49527d05c65e7_s_harrison.jpg)Stuart HarrisonHead of Seeds R&D Partnerships and Open Innovation](http://reshapebiotech.com/</case-studies/syngenta>)

Labs today are bogged down by manual processes, outdated lab tools and disconnected software, delaying the breakthroughs necessary to tackle the world’s biggest challenges.
At Reshape, we believe scientists deserve better — tools purpose-built for the work they do. Tools that automate the repetitive. Streamline data gathering. And deliver precision insights on demand.
[Our mission](http://reshapebiotech.com/</about>)
What we offer
## A connected platform of intuitive devices & AI-driven analysis
Reshape’s robots are designed to work in perfect sync with the platform. Each device captures high-quality data and instantly transmits it to the cloud, where real-time AI analysis begins immediately.
### [Imaging DeviceAutomated imaging and analysis throughout incubation—faster results, zero manual work, better data.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/673f39bdc866d4c504d82014_Large%20card.avif)Learn more](http://reshapebiotech.com/</imaging-device>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/67a4b584e9aa4b683d8e0064_HTID%20render%20thumbnail.webp)High-Throughput ImagingHigh-throughput plate analysis at scale.Coming Q1 2025Learn more](http://reshapebiotech.com/</high-throughput-imaging-device>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/674733cd6ce575572438193b_Animated_platform_2.gif)Discovery PlatformAll your plate-based experiments in one place, instantly analyzed and accessible from anywhere.Learn moreLearn more](http://reshapebiotech.com/</discovery-platform>)
What we offer
## Automate, analyze, and scale experiments effortlessly
Reshape’s robots are designed to work in perfect sync with the platform. Each device captures high-quality data and instantly transmits it to the cloud, where real-time AI analysis begins immediately.
[01Automate your experimentsEasily integrate robots that track and collect data from your experiments, so you can focus on the big picture while the details take care of themselves.](http://reshapebiotech.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[02Apply AI-powered analysisTurn captured experiments into actionable insights with machine learning that empowers faster, smarter decisions from day one.](http://reshapebiotech.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[03Achieve reproducibility at scaleStandardize data across labs, creating a solid foundation for discoveries and scalable AI-driven innovation.](http://reshapebiotech.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
Our vision
## A new benchmark for lab automation & software
We combine automation with real-time AI analysis to help labs run faster, make better decisions, and scale effortlessly.
01
### Make your labs AI-ready
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/6749c5349779113251eb2edc_ai.svg)
Start capturing machine learning-curated data, scale insights across teams, and build the foundation for predictive analytics.
02
### Enable collaboration across scientists and teams
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/6749c534381522af00842ca6_connections.svg)
Unify experiment workflows and data sharing across labs with standardized data, enabling faster and more effective collaboration.
03
### Accelerate product pipelines & cut costs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/6749c534d942c4d8de8b7e7e_funnel.svg)
Drive your product pipeline forward with better data and reduce development costs through intelligent automation.
our Solutions
## Easily work across different applications & industries
Reshape allows you to standardize your experiments across industries, sectors and assays. All in one platform.
[![Automate tedious assessment of plates and let AI-powered image analysis provide real time insights to improve your research.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674cbb3f825ea3c7743ad5b1_agriculture.png)AgricultureAutomate competition assays for pesticide development across fungi, insects, seed health and more.](http://reshapebiotech.com/</industries/agriculture>)
[![Modernize your labs with automated experiments and precision image analysis tailored to the industrial biotech challenges of today.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674cbb6fdaa4c666965d286b_industrials.png)IndustrialsEnable automated high throughput microbial discovery or do library and enzyme screens with much higher resolution.](http://reshapebiotech.com/</industries/industrials>)
[![Automate tedious assessment of plates and let AI-powered image analysis provide insights to improve your food & ingredient-related research.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/674cbb59f268a519ba349444_food.png)Food & IngredientsSupercharge your functional ingredient characterization, stability testing, acidification and many other assays.](http://reshapebiotech.com/</industries/food-ingredients>)
[![Automate testing and analysis of cosmetics and personal care ingredients and products to ensure product quality, safety, and efficacy.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/649a2726261a3112788724d4/6749ea12d6075d16e19a1e96_personal_care.png)Personal care & CosmeticsAutomate testing and analysis to ensure product quality, safety, and efficacy.](http://reshapebiotech.com/</industries/personal-care>)
## Ready to accelerate your lab?
[Get started](http://reshapebiotech.com/<#>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64608feb3f5779469cdeaa1a/674767fce4d4953c286dc2a3_Logo_w.svg)](http://reshapebiotech.com/</>)

generated_description:
**Reshape Biotech Overview**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Copenhagen, Denmark, Reshape Biotech is on a mission to revolutionize the field of microbiology. Their approach? Building specialized robots designed to automate routine laboratory tasks, making life easier for microbiologists. While many companies opt for a multifaceted "one-size-fits-all" lab robot, Reshape takes a more focused route, developing separate robots for distinct functions—think of it as the right tool for the job rather than a Swiss Army knife that ends up gathering dust.

**Key Features and Offerings**

1. **Specialized Robots**: Reshape’s robots are optimized for specific tasks, from filling plates to analyzing images, ensuring ease of use and accurate results. 

2. **Connected Platform**: Their technology doesn't just stop at automation; it blends seamlessly with a cloud-based platform where real-time AI analysis takes place. This means high-quality data is captured and analyzed instantly for quicker, more informed decisions.

3. **Diverse Applications**: The platform is designed to cater to a range of industries, including agriculture, food and ingredients, cosmetics, and industrial biotech, allowing labs to standardize and streamline their experiments effectively.

4. **Impact Metrics**: Reshape has already captured over 30 million images and monitored more than 3,300 hours of experiments, powering research at both emerging startups and established industry giants.

5. **Community and Collaboration**: They aim to foster collaboration across teams by standardizing data practices, resulting in a more efficient scientific inquiry process.

**Current Team and Partnerships**

With a robust team of around 40 employees and guidance from Group Partner Jared Friedman, Reshape is part of Y Combinator’s W21 batch, demonstrating a commitment to rapid innovation and growth in the biotechnology space.

**Conclusion**

In a world where lab work can often feel bogged down by manual processes and outdated tools, Reshape Biotech is stepping in to make a significant difference. Their dedicated robots, cutting-edge analysis platform, and focus on user-friendly solutions offer a refreshing take on lab automation, aiming for a future where scientists can focus on what really matters—discovery. If you're intrigued, you can learn more on their website [Reshape Biotech](http://reshapebiotech.com).
